Class MasterClass

java.lang.Object
MasterClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
Buffer
public class MasterClass
extends java.lang.Object
implements Buffer
MasterClass creates 10 threads then generates random values of y and places them into a circular buffer which is shared between the slaves.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<java.lang.Double> buffer  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MasterClass()
    Constructor to initialize an ArrayBlockingQueue to hold the 10 threads

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double blockingGet()
    blockingGet is an overridden method from the Buffer class used to remove values from the shared buffer.
    void blockingPut​(double value)
    blockingPut is an overridden method from the Buffer class used to write values into the shared buffer which must be consumed exactly once.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • blockingPut

      public void blockingPut​(double value) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      blockingPut is an overridden method from the Buffer class used to write values into the shared buffer which must be consumed exactly once.
      Specified by:
      blockingPut in interface Buffer
      Parameters:
      value - to put into buffer
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if a thread is interrupted

    • blockingGet

      public double blockingGet() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      blockingGet is an overridden method from the Buffer class used to remove values from the shared buffer.
      Specified by:
      blockingGet in interface Buffer
      Returns:
      value from buffer
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted
